title: The Pixel 4 xl proximity sensor keeps going off
content:
Hello,

since i updated my Pixel 4 xl to Android 11 i have the problem, that my Proximity Sensor periodically breaks. So i can not use the Face detection and on calls the Screen keeps black so i can not control my device. 
If i reboot the Phone all is fine for circa 12h, than the Sensor breaks again.

Have someone the same issue or can someone help me?
